metadata.title: CVE-2018-11710 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: soundlib/pattern.h in libopenmpt before 0.3.9 allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecifiedother impact via a crafted AMS file because of an invalid write nearaddress 0 in an out-of-memory situation.

criterions.comment: libopenmpt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
